title: "Deep learning on the 2-dimensional Ising model to extract the crossover region with a variational autoencoder"
excerpt: "The 2-dimensional Ising model on a square lattice is investigated with a variational autoencoder in the non-vanishing field case for the purpose of extracting the crossover region between the ferromagnetic and paramagnetic phases."
